It's about a bundle of #hand tools.

So, and hopefully now we are all busy with the simplest security measures before the #weekend, which should be a matter of course for a long time: #ITSecurity # Change passwords regularly #Security campaign #CyberSecurity #Hacker attack #official #privat https://twitter.com/Zett/status/ 1081213986325057543…
